pros: People were respectful. The organization emphasizes standard operating procedures. Ethical practice is valued. Acceptable workload.
cons: Sometimes, the overseas employees take the upper hand on the local employees, but this eventually subsides with building trust over time.

review_title: FHI 360 is a great place to work. It has many learning opportunities.
job_title: Senior Specialist Human Resources and Administrative in Dhaka
cons: Less experienced staff at the country level
